title: Revert Option Appears Twice in the Popup Menu
description: There are two Revert options in the menu.
OB: When opening the menu, I observed that there are two 'Revert' options listed.
EB: I expect that there should be only one 'Revert' option, and the duplicate should be disabled or removed.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Make changes to the editor content to make it 'dirty'.
3) Open the menu by right-clicking in the editor.
4) Observe the presence of two 'Revert' options, one listed after the 'UNDO' option, and the other before the 'FORMAT' option.
